languages.text: "Внемлите словам моим, ибо я призываю разжечь в груди пламя, перед которым не устоит никакая скверна".
"Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."
languages.original_text: "Внемлите словам моим, ибо я призываю разжечь в груди пламя, перед которым не устоит никакая скверна".

traits.locale_text: "Heed my words, for I ask you to kindle the flame in your chest that will dissipate any corruption."
"Heed my words, for I ask you to kindle the flame in your chest that will dissipate any corruption."
"Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."
"Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can withstand."
"Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can withstand."
"Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."
"Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."
"Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."

languages.text: “聆听我的话语，我要求你们在心中燃起信仰的火焰，让一切腐化无所遁形。”
languages.original_text: "Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."

traits.locale_text: “聆听我的话语，我要求你们在心中燃起信仰的火焰，让一切腐化无所遁形。”
“聆听我的话语，我要求你们在心中燃起信仰的火焰，让一切腐化都无所遁形。”

languages.text: «Escuchad mis palabras, pues os pido prender las llamas de la fe en vuestros corazones, a las que ninguna corrupción puede hacer frente».
languages.original_text: "Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."

traits.locale_text: «Escuchad mis palabras, pues os pido prender las llamas de la fe en vuestros corazones, a las que ninguna corrupción puede hacer frente».

languages.text: 「私の言葉に耳を傾けてください。いかなる腐敗も耐えられないほどの信仰の炎を、どうか胸に燃え上がらせていただきたい」
languages.original_text: "Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."

traits.locale_text: 「私の言葉に耳を傾けてください。いかなる腐敗も耐えられないほどの信仰の炎を、どうか胸に燃え上がらせていただきたい」
「私の言葉に耳を傾けてください。いかなる腐敗も耐えられないほどの信仰の炎を、どうか胸に燃え上がらせていただきたい」

languages.text: « Entendez-moi, car je fais appel à la flamme de foi qui brûle en vous et à laquelle nulle corruption ne résiste ! »
languages.original_text: "Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."

traits.locale_text: « Entendez-moi, car je fais appel à la flamme de foi qui brûle en vous et à laquelle nulle corruption ne résiste ! »

languages.text: "Hört auf meine Worte, denn ich bitte Euch, in Eurer Brust wieder die Flammen des Glaubens zu entfachen, gegen die keine Verderbnis standhalten kann."
languages.original_text: "Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf meine Worte, denn ich bitte Euch, in Eurer Brust wieder die Flammen des Glaubens zu entfachen, gegen die keine Verderbnis standhalten kann."
"Hört auf meine Worte, denn ich bitte Euch, in Eurer Brust wieder die Flammen des Glaubens zu entfachen, gegen die keine Verderbnis standhalten kann."

languages.text: "Sözlerime kulak verin, yüreğinizdeki inanç ateşini harlayın. Bu ateşe hiçbir yozluk karşı koyamaz."
languages.original_text: "Heed my words, for I ask of you to kindle the flames of faith in your chest, against which no corruption can stand."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerime kulak verin, yüreğinizdeki inanç ateşini harlayın. Bu ateşe hiçbir yozluk karşı koyamaz."
